sources.title: The Lonesome Trail (1955) JOHN AGARüçï ADELE JERGENS
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Stars: John Agar, Adele Jergens, Edgar Buchanan, Wayne Morris,
Director: Richard Bartlett

An Army scout returns home to find his land, his house, and his girl all stolen by the same man‚Ä¶what‚Äôs a guy to do? 

TRIVIA: John Agar made his film debut in 1948 with FORT APACHE. Whether it was because Agar was newly married to Shirley Temple or because John Ford wanted to test him, the director rode him mercilessly, calling him "Mr. Temple"üçï

.

metadata.Plot: A veteran of the Indian wars, Johnny Rush returns to his home to find that it has been confiscated by a cattle baron taking over in the valley. Rush also finds that his girl is engaged to the baron, because the girl's fathers' ranch is in financial jeopardy. When Rush loses the use of his gun arm in a fight with the barons henchmen, he learns to use a bow and arrow for defense...with deadly consequences.
metadata.Writer: Richard Bartlett, Ian MacDonald, Gordon D. Shirreffs
metadata.Actors: Wayne Morris, John Agar, Margia Dean
